comment.author: 44001330@N02
comment._content: BL 15 inch siege howitzer Mk. 1, 12 were built by the Coventry Ordnance Works and used from late 1914 by the Royal Marines.

comment._content: Hi FYI: I have used this photo in one of my non-commercial SlideShare presentations for this year's contest.
